text: musa tanre janatayeat parannat orkkuka: "enre janame, ninnalentinan enne prayasappetuttunnat? niscayamayum ninnalkkariyam; nan ninnalilekkulla daivadutananenn.â€ annane avar valipilaccappeal allahu avarute manas'sukale nervaliyilninn vyaticalippiccu. adharmakarikale allahu nervaliyilakkukayilla
